SOAP-ENV:Fault.faultstring: BPCOR-6135: A fault was not handled in the process scope; Fault Name is {http://ws_solicita_autorizacion/}NegocioException; Fault Data is <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><jbi:message xmlns:msgns="http://ws_solicita_autorizacion/" name="NegocioException" type="msgns:NegocioException" version="1.0" xmlns:jbi="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jbi/wsdl-11-wrapper"><jbi:part><ns2:NegocioFault xmlns:ns2="http://ws_solicita_autorizacion/" xmlns:ns4="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope"><causa>Crédito insuficiente (incl. 5%)</causa></ns2:NegocioFault></jbi:part></jbi:message>. Sending errors for the pending requests in the process scope before terminating the process instance
